activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10966
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan @rithviknishad Can I work on this issue if it's relevant 

My Approach:
- Extract the exact error Message
- Instead of showing "Bad Request", display the actual issue (e.g., "Image width exceeds 1024px") Then show the error message in UI
- Display a clear validation message below the upload field.
- Disable Save Button When Image is Invalid

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10817
activity.text:
@rithviknishad @Jacobjeevan Can I work on this issue if it's relevant
My Approach:
- Identify the rot cause of the issue by analyzing how react-hook-form's Controller interacts with @radix-ui/react-select.
- Wrap the Select component with React.forwardRef() to properly handle refs.
- Update the UserForm.tsx (or relevant file) to use the corrected Select component.
